A.description: "A" is the first letter of the alphabet and the first vowel.

examples: You cannot go around life being careless.
Tako uno bore rumu ligi vita mai alapa.
Be careful or you will get hurt.
Mamai alatiu tai kayo xotokurian satua.
I warn you about it all the time.
Ako amara kayo yaku ito ebete aru kroni.
I am warning you: Do not make me mad!
Ako mai amara kayo: Uno guguma iko bangi.
Love is the very best part of being alive.
Ame mai aru bana iyi tundu ari mai viteng.

definitions: Look (as in the look of something).
examples: You have such a pretty look!

definitions: To look. (as in how you look.)
Anarchist (as in with an anarchist nature).

examples: I did it before the evening.
Ako lakananon ito anoni aru anuring.

definitions: Just (as in this is just too much).

examples: I think of you every day.
Ako mikiro ari kayo keto aran.
The dog is as cute as they can be.
Aru golen mai as bae as mako bore mai.

B.description: "B" is the second letter of the alphabet and the first consonant.

definitions: To mess. (as in to mess something up)

examples: Today will be a good day.
My mother could never make something this good.
I drink a lot of coffee.
Tuesday is the second day of the week.
Biera mai aru biet era ari aru setima.
February is the second month of the year.
Biluna mai aru biet luna ari aru inyeon.

definitions: To beat (as in to hit physically).

D.description: "D" is the third letter of the alphabet and the second consonant.

definitions: A case (as in an incident under investigation by authorities).
To walk into a room or zone only to exit it immediately.

examples: Tomorrow will be a new day.
I may or may not have drunk it.
Ako desu tai uno desu miliki konlikidoanon ito.
I might have to do it.
You should stop now and continue tomorrow.
Tako handanon nasta kinoni na deve deiaran.

definitions: Release (as in the release of a new film book etc).
examples: The film saw a successful release.

E.description: "E" is the fourth letter of the alphabet and the second vowel.

definitions: Any (as in "He wasn’t any good at playing.").
To cup (as in to cup someone's face).
To fast (as in to not eat).

F.description: "F" is the fifth letter of the alphabet and the third consonant.

G.description: "G" is the sixth letter of the alphabet and the fourth consonant.

definitions: To make (as in to make someone...).
Ruler (as in a person who rules)

H.description: "H" is the seventh letter of the alphabet and the fifth consonant.

examples: I shame everyone whom I disagree with.
Ako hiya ketomon are ako uno nyetu uba.
I am ashamed of my actions.

I.description: "I" is the eighth letter of the alphabet and the third vowel.

definitions: To leave (as in to allow to remain).
examples: I leave the food on the table.
I hope you have a nice day!
Ako ikeru kayo miliki ang nindo aran!

definitions: English (As in the language and nationality).

examples: I received a gift from a friend.
Ako xotokuanon ang oxin iteba ang ibigan.
Your friend is so small and adorable.
Ka ibigan mai bana iti na bae.

definitions: Page (as in the page of a book).

J.description: "J" is the ninth letter of the alphabet and the sixth consonant.

definitions: End (as in the end of a period of time.)
End (as in the end of something).
Back. (As in the back of something).
A case (as in a container designed to hold or protect something).

examples: I am physically incapable of following the exercise routine.

definitions: Matter (as in what everything is made up of).

K.description: "K" is the tenth letter of the alphabet and the seventh consonant.

definitions: Calculator (as in a tool for making calculations).
Calculator (as in a person who makes calculations).

examples: I need to pass this class!
When were you planning to tell me!?
You will never find the body.

definitions: A cup (as in a water cup).
examples: I filled a cup with water.
Ako artionanon ang kawan uba wata.
The head is the top part of the body
Aru kefa mai aru blou (part) ari aru kata.
This will be the day we have waited for.
Kino mairian aru era ano miliki (waited) kola.

definitions: To draw (as in to draw an illustration).
To execute (as in to execute someone).

examples: Today is  the most important day of my life.
Kinoni mai aru kuno-kuno (important) aran ari ma vita.

L.description: "L" is the eleventh letter of the alphabet and the eighth consonant.

definitions: A case (as in a legal action).
A step (as in a step in a sequence of instructions).

examples: Guy seized her by the shoulders and turned her around

definitions: To return (as in to give back).

M.description: "M" is the twelfth letter of the alphabet and the ninth consonant.

examples: I am able to walk and run.
You should add less sugar to your coffee.
Tako handanon atroiso mapa sakan ni ka foci.

definitions: To return (as in to go back).
To make (as in to alter something so that it forms (something else)).
To make (carry out perform or produce (a specified action or sound)).
An agenda (as in a list of items to be discussed at a formal meeting).

examples: I want you to think about my proposal.

definitions: Worse than... (can also be substituted with a ‘-’ symbol).

examples: December is the 12th month of the year.
Monbiluna mai aru monbiet luna ari aru (year).
Monday is the first day of the week.
Monera mai aru moniet era ari aru setima.
January is the 1st month of the year.
Monluna mai aru moniet luna ari aru (year).
November is the 11th month of the year.
Monmonluna mai aru monmoniet luna ari aru (year).

N.description: "N" is the thirteenth letter of the alphabet and the tenth consonant.

examples: I want to show you my collection!

definitions: To act (as in to behave in a certain way).
To act (as in to do something).
examples: We have to act in consequence.

definitions: To reproduce (as in to reproduce content.).

examples: I yearn for the sweet release of non-existence.
Ako nalu kola aru jatan dimis un ione.
Ako nani yaku kayo seto kronis.
I bought a new game console.
Ako kaukanon ang neo ludu konsolu.
I restored it and it looks better than new.
Ako memulianon ito na ito ampa neoplus.
I think you’re a nice person.
Ako mikiro iko mai ang nindo imaniti.
Kino mai aru kuno noluxo noluxo.

definitions: To note (as in to notice or pay particular attention to something).

O.description: "O" is the fourteenth letter of the alphabet and the fourth vowel.

examples: Where did you hide the body?
Oko lakananon tako kakure aru kata?
If you mix red and yellow, you get orange.
Moski tako mixru aka na flaun, tako xotoku oreng.

definitions: Well (As in an expression before a sentence).
examples: Well, I think it is a nice gift.
Owu, ako mikiro ito mai ang nindo oxin.
I gifted them a video game.

P.description: "P" is the fifteenth letter of the alphabet and the eleventh consonant.

definitions: To play (as in to play a game).
Better than... (can also be substituted with a ‘+’ symbol.)
The press (as in the news press).
Template (as in a template for something).

R.description: "R" is the sixteenth letter of the alphabet and the twelfth consonant.

definitions: Right (to the furthest or most complete extent or degree (used for emphasis).)
Right (exactly; directly (used to emphasize the precise location or time of something).)
To reproduce. (as in to produce again.)
To reproduce (as in to give birth.)
To mess. (as in to mess with someone)
Ruler (as in the tool for measurement)

S.description: "S" is the seventeenth letter of the alphabet and the thirteenth consonant.

definitions: Reader (as in a person that reads something).
An act (as in a perverted act).
Writer (as in a thing that writes).
Writer (as in a person that writes).

T.description: "T" is the eighteenth letter of the alphabet and the fourteenth consonant.

definitions: A note (as in short informal letter or written message).
To smell (as in to smell something).

U.description: "U" is the nineteenth letter of the alphabet and the fifth vowel.

definitions: To leave (as in to go away from).
To make. (As in to build something).
(When added at the beginning of a word we give it the opposite meaning.)

examples: Ito mai kurana kayo mai ungki xania.

V.description: "V" is the twentieth letter of the alphabet and the fifteenth consonant.

definitions: A log (as in a text log).

examples: I really like the vocals in this song.
She was quite vocal about her disdain for you.
I voice a character in this game.
Ako vokoni ang (character) dala kino ludu.

W.description: "W" is the twenty-first letter of the alphabet and the sixteenth consonant.

definitions: A case (as in an instance of a particular situation).

X.description: "X" is the twenty-second letter of the alphabet and the seventeenth consonant.

Y.description: "Y" is the twenty-third letter of the alphabet and the eighteenth consonant.

definitions: May. (As in "May I ask you a question?").
To play (as in to reproduce content).

Z.description: "Z" is the twenty-fourth letter of the alphabet and the nineteenth consonant.
